title: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not hide the item from the PDF output.
OB: In the new PDF emitter, if the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item is still displayed in the PDF output.
EB: In the new PDF emitter, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should be hidden and not displayed in the PDF output.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'display' property of the label to 'none'.
4. Generate a new PDF with the emitter.
5. Check the PDF output to see if the label is hidden.
